price: 24. Alle waa Kan idinka celiyey gac- mahooda iyo gacmahiinna togga Makka agti, kaddib markuu idin siiyey guusha oo aad ka adkaateen (kuwii idiin galay cimilka markaad u socoteen Makkah). Alle waa Arkaha waxaad fashaan.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي كَفَّ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ عَنكُمۡ وَأَيۡدِيَكُمۡ عَنۡهُم بِبَطۡنِ مَكَّةَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَنۡ أَظۡفَرَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī kaffa aydiyahum ʿankum wa-aydiyakum ʿanhum bibaṭni makkata min baʿdi an aẓfarakum ʿalayhim wakāna al-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīran
